sentences.sentence: This is the sort of drivel you get from a bunch of feral leftie hippies with no idea of the real world.
sentences.translation: 这就是一群满脑子幻想的野生左撇子嬉皮士才说的疯话。

sentences.sentence: Many of the world's leaders and stars are left-handed, with some known for being hot-tempered. One famously grumpy leftie is tennis legend John McEnroe.
sentences.translation: 世界上有许多领导人和明星都是左撇子，有些确以脾气火爆闻名，网球界传奇人物约翰·麦肯罗便是其中一例。
